summary: WINDSHIELD WIPERS WILL NOT ENGAGE.  SOME TIMES THEY WILL COME ON AND NOT STOP.  WHEN ITS RAINING THEY WILL NOT COME ON AT ALL.  UP UNTIL RECENTLY THIS HAS BEEN THE ISSUE.  TWO DAYS AGO IT DECIDED THAT IT WASN'T GOING TO WORK AT ALL.  SO I CANNOT DRIVE MY CAR IN THE RAIN AND CANNOT AFFORD TO HAVE THE MOTOR REPAIRED AT THE DEALER FOR 600.    *NLM
